ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T20:05:04 [Issue ID 4000-576545] urn:comicvine:4000-576545
ComicInfo.Summary:
Janey and her road crew continue their battle with The Brotherhood of Monster Truckers, but when the monsters appear to be possessed by space parasites, it’s time to call on an old friend… or more like frenemy! Vampblade returns, fighting alongside Zombie Tramp this time!
Features 3 regular and risqué variants, including a pair of variants by Dan Mendoza and new series artist Celor!!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Regular Cover | Celor | 1 | B | Risqué Cover, Limited to 2500 | Celor | 2 | C | Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Dan Mendoza | 3 | D | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Dan Mendoza | 4 | E | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Celor | 5 | F | Artist Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Celor | 6 |
